0.1.name: wordpress/yet-another-newsletter
0.1.description:
With this plugin, you can send newsletters ! (magic) But the best is to send newsletter to your public so there is a simple widget to do that ! (personnalize it within the code) Want to remove subscribers ? You can ! Want to change the "From:" field ? You can ! Bored to write HTML to send mails ? You now can send a post ! Bored by ads… ? There are no ad (and use Adblock Plus for other websites).

Now, download this plugin and use it ;).

REALLY simple newsletter plugin, one file, use the php mail() function, you can easily edit it.
